hero.title: Upstream Labs
hero.subtitle: Where Every Push Returns to the Source
hero.description: We empower developers, creators, and communities to transform open collaboration into sustainable public goods through training, mentorship, and funding.

mission.title: What We Do
mission.subtitle: We build bridges between open-source communities, industry partners, and public institutions to create lasting impact.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.description: Open source is more than code—it's a collaborative civic culture that cultivates trust, shared value, and long-term sustainability.

cta.title: Join Upstream
cta.subtitle: Where every push returns to the source, and every source renews the world.
